//Custom Hook
import{useEffect,useContext}from"react";import getGifs from"../services/getGifs";import GifsContext from"./GifsContext";export function useGifs(){var _ref=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{keyword:null},keyword=_ref.keyword;var _useContext=useContext(GifsContext),gifs=_useContext.gifs,setGifs=_useContext.setGifs;useEffect(function(){var keywordToUse=keyword||localStorage.getItem('lastKeyword')||'random';getGifs({keyword:keywordToUse}).then(function(gifs){setGifs(gifs);localStorage.setItem('lastKeyword',keyword);});},[keyword,setGifs]);return{gifs:gifs};}
